title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-3.2 - Application for certification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8188-3.2 - Application for certification

State Regulations
A person seeking to become a State certified candidate for
assessor shall submit to ORPTS an application or a written request for such
certification. Such application or written request shall set forth the person's
educational background, employment history and professional designations, if
any. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8188-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
